headline: Bowyer Research Advises Against Proposal on Energy Assumptions at Southern (NYSE:SO)
summary: Bowyer Research recently recommended shareholders vote against a proposal requiring Southern (NYSE:SO) to disclose assumptions on its fossil fuel reliance, to be discussed at the 2025 annual meeting. Over the last week, Southern's stock saw a 6% rise. This movement contrasts with the broader market where the S&P 500 slipped due to rising Treasury yields amidst legislative tax discussions. headline: Southern Company announces upsize and pricing of $1.45 billion in aggregate principal amount of Series 2025A 3.25% Convertible Senior Notes due June 15, 2028
summary: Southern Company (NYSE: SO) today announced the pricing of $1.45 billion in aggregate principal amount of its Series 2025A 3.25% Convertible Senior Notes due June 15, 2028 (the "Convertible Notes") in a private placement to qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"), reflecting an upsize of $200 million over the previously announced offering size.
